Title: The Monkey King
Description:
Ever since the Horde captured the Divine Bell I have been searching for a means to counter its power.

My research got as far as this tomb. I am going inside. If you follow me, I will share the rest as we go.

If we get separated, meet me back here at the entrance to the tomb. Speak to me when you are ready to proceed.
ObjectivesText: Help Anduin Wrynn find the Monkey King in the Valley of Emperors.
PortraitGiverText: Sometimes the only way to beat a legend is with another legend.
